python_codes.general.cosd#

cosd(x)[source]#

Cosine element-wise np.cos with an input in degree.

Parameters

x (array_like) – Input array in degree.

Returns

y – The corresponding tangent values. This is a scalar if x is a scalar.

Return type

array_like
